idea: AdiVeda SkinTech Private Limited (ASPL) is a new age startup focused on solving and alleviating confidence-sapping skin conditions of women. In collaboration with Kamedis Ltd. of Israel, we bring the best of western science and eastern ingredients to create elixir like healing touch of botanicals to the India market for the first time. All our actives are not only nature derived but also clinically tested to deliver claimed benefits. ASPL will deploy state of the art D2C technologies to deliver the best of nature and science directly to its consumers across India.
